title: SponsorReportQr
description: MVP Sponsor Report QR Response Contract v1.0 - QR code for sponsor-scoped SharedReport access

url.description: Sponsor report URL with sponsorId parameter (e.g., ?page=report&sponsor=true&sponsorId=<ID>)

qrB64.description: Base64-encoded PNG QR code image (without data:image/png;base64, prefix). Empty string if URL could not be verified.

verified.description: True if QR was generated for a verified deployment URL; false if deployment URL was unavailable

sponsorId.description: Sponsor identifier to generate QR for

brandId.description: Optional: Brand ID for admin context

adminKey.description: Optional: Admin key for authentication (allows generating QR for any sponsor)
